title: Veenotes (alpha)
shortDescription: The ultimate tool to learn more effectively from online videos.
description: Veenote is a React and Django-based application designed to enhance video-based learning. It allows users to bookmark key moments, add detailed notes, and organize videos into collections for a more structured learning experience. The app leverages modern web technologies to deliver a seamless and engaging interface, deployed on scalable platforms.
features: React.js frontend for a dynamic and intuitive user experience
RESTful API powered by Django for managing videos, bookmarks, and collections
Tailwind CSS for a responsive and customizable design system
Seamless user authentication and management with Clerk integration
Scalable deployment with Heroku and Netlify

title: Devjokes API
shortDescription: A RESTful API that serves developer jokes.
description: Django-based Devjokes API as a side project with a react frontend for the API documentation. RESTful endpoints for jokes, deployed with an SQLite database to Heroku. A serverside script reloads the initial state of the database at every Dyno restart.
features: React.js frontend that serves as a documentation and project showcase
Postman collection for testing the API
SQLite database for storing jokes

title: HR Leave Management Tool
shortDescription: Handle leave requests for your Team easily.
description: Final project for my 8-month intensive full stack course, creating a tool where HR and team managers can handle leave requests and keep track of employee absence. Employees can request vacations, trainings and file absence notices. Stack: React, Django, Postgres
features: Advanced user hierarchy with different roles and permissions
Email notifications for leave requests and approvals
Calendar view for team managers to keep track of employee absence

title: Cookbook API
shortDescription: Manage and share recipes with Django API.
description: Django-based Cookbook API for managing and sharing culinary recipes, featuring RESTful endpoints, JWT authentication, and integration with DigitalOcean Spaces for media storage. Utilized Django Rest Framework and JWT authentication.
features: JWT authentication for secure access to the API
DigitalOcean Spaces for media storage
Postman collection for testing the API

title: rezensia.ch
shortDescription: High sales, great UI, low support requests.
description:
Frontend design, Wordpress implentation and custom JavaScript for rezensia.ch. From zero to five figures of sales within the first month through a good and working UI.  
High conversion rate, low support requests, awesome user feedback.
features: Custom JavaScript for a better user experience
Rating Calculator for users to find the right product
Custom Wordpress theme (Elementor) for a unique design

title: Maklerverzeichnis
shortDescription: Real estate listings: WordPress, ratings, business development.
description: Frontend design, implementation in WordPress, and business development. A Real estate agent listing platform with rating functionalities. The platform has good exposure and is helping homeowners to find a proficient real estate agent in their area.
features: Rating functionalities for real estate agents
Custom Wordpress theme for a unique design
Business development for the platform
